"Progress requires drastic change." — Talbot Grimes

compound_thirty_three.name: Compound Thirty-Three
compound_thirty_three.description:
Talbot's penultimate attempt at a serum. Though it did not facilitate his escape, it did have powerful side effects.
  • Any Survivor within 16 metres of a Slam will suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds.
  • Slamming Pallets or Breakable Walls will destroy them and stun The Blight for 1.5 seconds.

"Time is scarce. Let this be the one..." — Talbot Grimes

rotten_pumpkin.name: Rotten Pumpkin
rotten_pumpkin.description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
  • Traversing the Upside Down will destroy the Portal you entered.

Rotten Pumpkin grants an additional 200 Bloodpoints for traversing the Upside Down.

black_heart.name: Black Heart
black_heart.description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.
  • Slightly increases Shred Recovery speed after successful Shred attacks.

rat_liver.name: Rat Liver
rat_liver.description:
A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.
  • Slightly increases The Demogorgon's Movement speed while charging Of the Abyss.

rat_tail.name: Rat Tail
rat_tail.description:
A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.
  • Slightly increases Portal Opening speed.

sticky_lining.name: Sticky Lining
sticky_lining.description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Slightly increases Killer Instinct Detection range when charging Of the Abyss.

viscous_webbing.name: Viscous Webbing
viscous_webbing.description:
Wet, elastic webs that broaden the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Slightly increases Portal Sealing time for Survivors.

rotten_green_tripe.name: Rotten Green Tripe
rotten_green_tripe.description:
Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.
  • Slightly increases The Demogorgon's Movement speed while traversing the Upside Down.

mews_guts.name: Mew's Guts
mews_guts.description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.
  • Slightly reduces Cool-down for missed Shred attacks.
  • Increases the number of available Portals by 1.

barbs_glasses.name: Barb's Glasses
barbs_glasses.description:
A broken pair of glasses that travelled to the Upside Down.
  • Slightly increases Shred Recovery speed after using it to break a Breakable Wall or Pallet .

elevens_soda.name: Eleven's Soda
elevens_soda.description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.
  • Reveals the Auras of Generators being repaired in yellow while traversing the Upside Down.

thorny_vines.name: Thorny Vines
thorny_vines.description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Slightly increases Portal Sealing time for Survivors.
  • Slightly increases Killer Instinct Detection range when charging Of the Abyss.

brass_case_lighter.name: Brass Case Lighter
brass_case_lighter.description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.
  • Survivors under the effect of an activated Portal suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
    Once out of contact with the Portal, this effect persists for 60 seconds.

"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

violet_waxcap.name: Violet Waxcap
violet_waxcap.description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.
  • Slightly increases Undetectable Status Effect duration after emerging from Portals.

deer_lung.name: Deer Lung
deer_lung.description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.
  • Considerably increases The Demogorgon's Movement speed while traversing the Upside Down.
  • Reduces the number of available Portals by 2.

lifeguard_whistle.name: Lifeguard Whistle
lifeguard_whistle.description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.
  • Survivors near activated Portals are indicated by Killer Instinct without having to charge Of the Abyss.

"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

vermilion_webcap.name: Vermilion Webcap
vermilion_webcap.description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.
  • Moderately increases Undetectable Status Effect duration after emerging from Portals.

"Still experimenting with this specimen, so far our results are inconsistent." — Hawkins National Laboratory

upside_down_resin.name: Upside Down Resin
upside_down_resin.description:
A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Moderately increases Portal Sealing time for Survivors.

"A sample taken from the bark of the tree once used as a gate. So far our conclusion as to its effect are inconclusive." — Hawkins National Laboratory

unknown_egg.name: Unknown Egg
unknown_egg.description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.
  • Considerably reduces Of the Abyss Recovery time after traversing the Upside Down.

"A large egg was sighted in the Upside Down, but no sample survived the trip to the lab for proper examination." — Hawkins National Laboratory

leprose_lichen.name: Leprose Lichen
leprose_lichen.description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.
  • Reveals the Aura of all Survivors while traversing the Upside Down and for 3 seconds after emerging from a Portal.

"One small dose can cause severe hallucinations." — Hawkins National Laboratory

red_moss.name: Red Moss
red_moss.description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.
  • The Demogorgon emerges from Portals silently, but more slowly.
  • Tremendously increases Undetectable Status Effect duration after emerging from Portals.

"Consuming its leaf enhances athletic performance and causes euphoria." — Hawkins National Laboratory

yakuyoke_talisman.name: Yakuyoke Talisman
yakuyoke_talisman.description:
Considering his goals pure and just, Kazan carried a trinket to ward off evil that might lead him astray.
  • Slightly increases Blood Orb Absorption speed.

rotting_rope.name: Rotting Rope
rotting_rope.description:
Had the rope been stronger it would have likely held Kazan. As it was, he escaped and butchered his captors.
  • Slightly increases Blood Orb Aura Detection range.

"Though Death is focused, he has been known to blink." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:5

cracked_sakazuki.name: Cracked Sakazuki
cracked_sakazuki.description:
A cup from Kazan's wedding ceremony. It never made it through the night before being damaged.
  • Slightly reduces Blood Fury Activation time.
  • Slightly reduces Blood Fury Deactivation time.

blackened_toenail.name: Blackened Toenail
blackened_toenail.description:
Fell off during one of Kazan's hundred winter treks to the temple. Despite his pilgrimage, Akito's leg would never heal.
  • Slightly increases Absorption Movement speed.

"If a father sacrifices not for his children, then who does he father?" — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:12

polished_maedate.name: Polished Maedate
polished_maedate.description:
A horned crest Kazan tore from his helmet after being compared to a demon.
  • Slightly increases Yamaoka's Wrath Passive Charge rate.

ink_lion.name: Ink Lion
ink_lion.description:
An ink painting that once hung in the Yamaoka Estate. Depicts the story of a lion eaten by mice.
  • Slightly reduces Blood Fury Activation time.
  • Slightly reduces Blood Fury Deactivation time.
  • Moderately reduces Blood Fury Duration penalty when downing a Survivor.

chipped_saihai.name: Chipped Saihai
chipped_saihai.description:
A baton that belonged to Renjiro. It was stolen by Kazan upon his departure.
  • Slightly increases Blood Fury duration.

childs_wooden_sword.name: Child's Wooden Sword
childs_wooden_sword.description:
Akito's practice sword. The child had little use for it after his injury.
  • Moderately increases Blood Orb Aura Detection range.

bloody_sash.name: Bloody Sash
bloody_sash.description:
Blood from a boy who called Kazan "The Noble Impostor". Kazan hid evidence of the fight from his father, often revelling at the sash in secret.
  • Moderately increases Absorption Movement speed.

yamaoka_sashimono.name: Yamaoka Sashimono
yamaoka_sashimono.description:
The banner of the Yamaoka family, Kazan felt an overwhelming pride from it.
  • Moderately increases Blood Fury duration.

wooden_oni_mask.name: Wooden Oni Mask
wooden_oni_mask.description:
A mask that a young Kazan bought to celebrate Setsubun, its repulsively fanged mouth began haunting his nightmares.
  • Slightly reduces the Passive Blood Orb Drop Rate cool-down.
  • Survivors drop 1 extra Blood Orb on Game Events.

"It is no coincidence that man is so familiar with demons." — Renjiro's Doctrine 3:8

shattered_wakizashi.name: Shattered Wakizashi
shattered_wakizashi.description:
The fragments of an ancestral blade, destroyed by Kazan in a fit of rage.
  • Moderately increases Yamaoka's Wrath Passive Charge rate.

scalped_topknot.name: Scalped Topknot
scalped_topknot.description:
The topknot of a samurai who questioned Kazan's honour. The roots cling to a thin strip of bloody skin.
  • Considerably reduces Demon Dash Activation time while Blood Fury is active.

kanai_anzen_talisman.name: Kanai-Anzen Talisman
kanai_anzen_talisman.description:
A trinket given to Kazan at birth, its powers are meant to protect his family from harm.
  • Moderately increases Demon Dash Movement speed while Blood Fury is active.

tear_soaked_tenugui.name: Tear Soaked Tenugui
tear_soaked_tenugui.description:
The cloth that Kazan's mother cried into when he left on his pilgrimage to cleanse the samurai.
  • Considerably reduces Blood Fury Duration penalty when downing a Survivor.

splintered_hull.name: Splintered Hull
splintered_hull.description:
Fragments of a ship that carried Renjiro Yamaoka. Against all odds, the legendary samurai seemed to survive.
  • Moderately reduces the Passive Blood Orb Drop Rate cool-down.
  • Survivors drop 1 extra Blood Orb on Game Events.

"To plan subterfuge, begin with a counsel of none." — Renjiro's Doctrine 7:9

lion_fang.name: Lion Fang
lion_fang.description:
A tooth sold from an exotic vendor, it symbolises power and nobility.
  • Considerably increases Blood Fury duration.

akitos_crutch.name: Akito's Crutch
akitos_crutch.description:
The crutch used by Kazan's son after falling from a tree. Akito's playmate and her family were punished for the boy's injury.
  • Considerably increases Demon Dash Movement speed while Blood Fury is active.

renjiros_bloody_glove.name: Renjiro's Bloody Glove
renjiros_bloody_glove.description:
The glove Renjiro held to his sternum following the strike dealt by his son Kazan.
  • All Survivors can see Blood Orbs.
  • A Survivor's Aura is revealed for 2 seconds whenever they come into contact with a Blood Orb, absorbing it in the process.
  • This effect stacks for each Blood Orb absorbed.

"When all else spills out, cling only to your honour." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:12

iridescent_family_crest.name: Iridescent Family Crest
iridescent_family_crest.description:
A crest that denotes its owner as being a part of the Yamaoka family.
  • While Blood Fury is active, missing a Demon Strike will cause all Survivors within 12 metres to scream and reveal their current location to you.

"Know who you are so you may shield your heart." — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:2

smiley_face_pin.name: Smiley Face Pin
smiley_face_pin.description:
A friendly looking, bright yellow button used as a sarcastic statement.
  • Hitting a Survivor highlighted by Killer Instinct while in Feral Frenzy applies the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

scratched_ruler.name: Scratched Ruler
scratched_ruler.description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.
  • Slightly reduces Feral Frenzy Recovery time.

mischief_list.name: Mischief List
mischief_list.description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish, memento of brighter days.
  • Slightly increases Feral Frenzy duration.

friendship_bracelet.name: Friendship Bracelet
friendship_bracelet.description:
A wide grey and red braided rope bracelet. The inscription "F. J. S. J." can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.
  • Slightly increases Killer Instinct Detection range.

never_sleep_pills.name: Never-Sleep Pills
never_sleep_pills.description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or draining activities.
  • Moderately increases Killer Instinct Detection range.

mural_sketch.name: Mural Sketch
mural_sketch.description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.
  • Moderately increases Feral Frenzy duration.

julies_mix_tape.name: Julie's Mix Tape
julies_mix_tape.description:
A dark and depressing mix tape made out from mainly power ballads and gloomy melodies.
  • Slightly decreases fatigue after Feral Frenzy ends.

etched_ruler.name: Etched Ruler
etched_ruler.description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
  • Moderately reduces Feral Frenzy Recovery time.

defaced_smiley_pin.name: Defaced Smiley Pin
defaced_smiley_pin.description:
A once friendly looking, bright yellow button of a defaced smiley. A signature icon of The Legion.
  • Hitting a Survivor highlighted by Killer Instinct while in Feral Frenzy applies the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

the_legion_pin.name: The Legion Pin
the_legion_pin.description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion. To use exclusively on intimidation dares.
  • Hitting a Survivor highlighted by Killer Instinct while in Feral Frenzy applies the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds.

susies_mix_tape.name: Susie's Mix Tape
susies_mix_tape.description:
A fast and thrilling mix tape with energising songs with break-neck beats.
  • Considerably increases Killer Instinct Detection range.

stolen_sketch_book.name: Stolen Sketch Book
stolen_sketch_book.description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre sketches.
  • Considerably increases Feral Frenzy duration.

nasty_blade.name: Nasty Blade
nasty_blade.description:
This blade is stained with unsanitary spots of grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
  • Slightly increases Survivors' Mending time when affected by the Deep Wound Status Effect.

joeys_mix_tape.name: Joey's Mix Tape
joeys_mix_tape.description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for chillaxin' when life's a bitch.
  • Moderately decreases fatigue after Feral Frenzy ends.

stab_wounds_study.name: Stab Wounds Study
stab_wounds_study.description:
A printed medical article stolen from Ormond's public library, vulgarising a study on lesions and stab wounds.
  • Moderately reduces the Deep Wound timer of all Survivors.

franks_mix_tape.name: Frank's Mix Tape
franks_mix_tape.description:
Never go on a kill mission without your tunes. A track list of massive distortions and loud percussion that stabs at your eardrums.
  • Allows Feral Frenzy attacks to considerably reduce a Survivor's Deep Wound timer.

filthy_blade.name: Filthy Blade
filthy_blade.description:
This blade is stained with foul spots of blood and grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
  • Moderately increases Survivors' Mending time when affected by the Deep Wound Status Effect.

cold_dirt.name: Cold Dirt
cold_dirt.description:
A handful of dirt collected from the janitor's final resting place. It is unnaturally cold.
  • Considerably decreases cool-down of Feral Frenzy.

iridescent_button.name: Iridescent Button
iridescent_button.description:
A glass-like button moulded from The Fog that captures The Legion's likeness. The surface is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.

During Feral Frenzy:

  • The Legion's Terror Radius affects the entire Map.
  • Any Pallets you vault are immediately broken.

This effect lasts until the Power gauge is depleted.

"The youth consumed by the iridescent glass magnifies and widens the reach of The Entity."

fuming_mix_tape.name: Fuming Mix Tape
fuming_mix_tape.description:
Dark beats, violent shreds and unfathomable vocals from another world fill the mind with a vibrating sixth sense.
  • While using Feral Frenzy, the Repair Progression of Generators can be determined by the intensity of their Auras.

spit_polish_rag.name: Spit Polish Rag
spit_polish_rag.description:
A grimy piece of burlap. Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the speargun in the heat of a shootout.
  • Slightly decreases Speargun cool-down after missed shots.

snake_oil.name: Snake Oil
snake_oil.description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman. Purported to cure all that ails you.
  • Slightly increases Speargun Reeling speed.

rickety_chain.name: Rickety Chain
rickety_chain.description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun. Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.
  • Grants 50 % bonus Bloodpoints for Speared Score Events.
  • Survivors break free from the Speargun more easily.

modified_ammo_belt.name: Modified Ammo Belt
modified_ammo_belt.description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialised weaponry. Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.
  • Slightly reduces Speargun Reload time.

rusted_spike.name: Rusted Spike
rusted_spike.description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity. The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.
  • Hitting a speared Survivor inflicts the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

poison_oak_leaves.name: Poison Oak Leaves
poison_oak_leaves.description:
An ordinary-looking plant, Caleb found out that spears coated in its oil cause unbearable blistering around wound.
  • Slightly increases Survivors' Mending time when affected by the Deep Wound Status Effect.

marshals_badge.name: Marshal's Badge
marshals_badge.description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang's bounties.
  • Slightly decreases The Deathslinger's Terror Radius while aiming down the Speargun's sights.
  • Slightly decreases The Deathslinger's Movement speed while aiming down the Speargun's sights.

"Get your prayers in, you'll be swinging by noon." — Caleb Quinn

jaw_smasher.name: Jaw Smasher
jaw_smasher.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout. It brings back burning desire for revenge.
  • Slightly increases The Deathslinger's Movement speed while aiming down the Speargun's sights.

"You called death to your door the instant you done me wrong." — Caleb Quinn

chewing_tobacco.name: Chewing Tobacco
chewing_tobacco.description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale. Stimulates the nervous system.
  • Moderately decreases Stun duration when Survivors break free from the Speargun.

wardens_keys.name: Warden's Keys
wardens_keys.description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.
  • Moderately reduces Speargun Reload time.

wanted_poster.name: Wanted Poster
wanted_poster.description:
The yellowed remains of a wanted poster for Mason Kelly. It kept Caleb focused on the hunt.
  • Moderately increases The Deathslinger's Movement speed while aiming down the Speargun's sights.

"You'll be met with a fierce reckoning, swear it on my mom's grave." — Caleb Quinn

tin_oil_can.name: Tin Oil Can
tin_oil_can.description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery. Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.
  • Moderately decreases Speargun cool-down after missed shots.

honey_locust_thorn.name: Honey Locust Thorn
honey_locust_thorn.description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.
  • Survivors who break free from the Speargun are inflicted with the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

bayshores_gold_tooth.name: Bayshore's Gold Tooth
bayshores_gold_tooth.description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.
  • Moderately increases Speargun Reeling speed.

"Know your place, boy. Know you damn place." — Henry Bayshore

prison_chain.name: Prison Chain
prison_chain.description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb's ankle. It's been re-purposed to hook onto a spear.
  • Considerably increases the amount of Charges required for a Survivor to break free from the Speargun.

"Inmates working beyond the prison yard must be affixed with a steel ball of no less than 18 pounds." — Hellshire Penitentiary Guard Book

gold_creek_whiskey.name: Gold Creek Whiskey
gold_creek_whiskey.description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb's anger and slowed his step.
  • Moderately decreases The Deathslinger's Terror Radius while aiming down the Speargun's sights.
  • Moderately decreases The Deathslinger's Movement speed while aiming down the Speargun's sights.

"A smooth taste for the rugged frontier." — Gold Creek Advertisement, 1876

bayshores_cigar.name: Bayshore's Cigar
bayshores_cigar.description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb's boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.
  • Considerably decreases Stun duration when Survivors break free from the Speargun.

"Do not point that thing at me, you slack-jawed imbecile." — Henry Bayshore

barbed_wire.name: Barbed Wire
barbed_wire.description:
Pliable American-made steel lined with sharp barbs. Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.
  • Moderately increases Survivors' Mending time when affected by the Deep Wound Status Effect.

"There won't be nothing to fear soon. Till then, fear me." — Caleb Quinn

iridescent_coin.name: Iridescent Coin
iridescent_coin.description:
A glass-like coin moulded from the Fog itself. A payment to the bounty hunter for the services rendered.
  • Survivors speared from at least 15 metres away are inflicted with the Exposed Status Effect for as long as they remain speared.

"Deals made in desperation are paid for in madness."

hellshire_iron.name: Hellshire Iron
hellshire_iron.description:
The Hellshire's Gang branding iron. Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.
  • For as long as a Survivor is speared, the Auras of all other Survivors within The Deathslinger's Terror Radius are revealed for up to 6 seconds.

"Hellshire Gang: Justice Seekers or Outlaws?" — Glenvale Gazette headline

tacky_earrings.name: Tacky Earrings
tacky_earrings.description:
A very cheap piece of jewellery made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material.
  • Slightly increases Stalking Movement speed.

boyfriends_memo.name: Boyfriend's Memo
boyfriends_memo.description:
A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover.
  • Slightly increases The Shape's Lunge range in Evil Within I .

"The note is signed: D."

blond_hair.name: Blond Hair
blond_hair.description:
A single slightly wavy blond hair.
  • Slightly increases Evil Within III duration.
  • Slightly increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.

reflective_fragment.name: Reflective Fragment
reflective_fragment.description:
A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror.
  • Stalking a Survivor for 1 second with Evil Within II reveals their Aura for 2 seconds.

memorial_flower.name: Memorial Flower
memorial_flower.description:
A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone.
  • Slightly increases Evil Gain rate when Stalking.

jewellery.name: Jewellery
jewellery.description:
A large necklace made of beads an inexpensive metals. One of Judith's favourites.
  • Moderately increases Stalking Movement speed.

hair_brush.name: Hair Brush
hair_brush.description:
A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair.
  • Moderately increases Evil Within III duration.
  • Slightly increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.

glass_fragment.name: Glass Fragment
glass_fragment.description:
A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object. It is impossible to determine its origin.
  • Stalking a Survivor for 1 second with Evil Within I reveals their Aura for 3 seconds.

dead_rabbit.name: Dead Rabbit
dead_rabbit.description:
A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail.
  • Moderately decreases The Shape's Terror Radius in Evil Within II .
  • Moderately increases The Shape's Terror Radius in Evil Within III .

mirror_shard.name: Mirror Shard
mirror_shard.description:
A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror.
  • Stalking a Survivor for 1 second with Evil Within II reveals their Aura for 5 seconds.

judiths_journal.name: Judith's Journal
judiths_journal.description:
A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers. Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings.
  • You become obsessed with one Survivor.
  • Considerably increases the amount of Evil gained when Stalking your Obsession .

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

jewellery_box.name: Jewellery Box
jewellery_box.description:
A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored.
  • Considerably increases Stalking Movement speed.

j._myers_memorial.name: J. Myers Memorial
j._myers_memorial.description:
A glossy page ripped from the 1965 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers.
  • Moderately increases Evil Gain rate when Stalking.

hair_bow.name: Hair Bow
hair_bow.description:
A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair.
  • Considerably increases Evil Within III duration.
  • Slightly increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.

vanity_mirror.name: Vanity Mirror
vanity_mirror.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it.
  • When Stalking, Evil Within II reveals the Aura of Survivors within 16 metres.
  • Evil Within cannot progress past Evil Within II.
  • Each Hit Score Event grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints in the Brutality Category and additional 150 % Bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
  • Slightly decreases The Shape's Movement speed.

tombstone_piece.name: Tombstone Piece
tombstone_piece.description:
A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone.
  • Kill healthy or injured Survivors with Evil Within III .
  • Disables the ability to Stalk with Evil Within III.
  • Considerably drains the Power Gauge after killing a Survivor.
  • Considerably increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.

scratched_mirror.name: Scratched Mirror
scratched_mirror.description:
A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object.
  • When Stalking, Evil Within I reveals the Aura of Survivors within 32 metres.
  • Evil Within cannot progress past Evil Within I.
  • Each Hit Score Event grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints in the Brutality Category and additional 200 % Bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.

lock_of_hair.name: Lock of Hair
lock_of_hair.description:
A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic.
  • Tremendously increases Evil Within III duration.
  • Moderately increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.

judiths_tombstone.name: Judith's Tombstone
judiths_tombstone.description:
A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers.
  • Kill healthy or injured Survivors with Evil Within III .
  • Disables the ability to Stalk with Evil Within III.
  • Tremendously increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III for the first time.
  • Moderately decreases The Shape's Movement speed.

"Here lies our beloved daughter."

fragrant_tuft_of_hair.name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair
fragrant_tuft_of_hair.description:
A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp. Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance.
  • Unlimited Evil Within III duration.
  • Tremendously increases the amount of Evil required to reach Evil Within III.

lead_ring.name: Lead Ring
lead_ring.description:
Found in a refrigerator. It's engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.
  • Slightly increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment.

dead_butterfly.name: Dead Butterfly
dead_butterfly.description:
A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It's frail and nearly falls apart when touched.
  • Slightly reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time.

copper_ring.name: Copper Ring
copper_ring.description:
Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It's engraved with a picture of a spider.
  • Slightly increases Rites of Judgement Power duration.

"I was locked up inside the basement's basement. It was so small and dark, and I was so afraid. I dropped my precious ring. But I'll never ever go back there."

black_strap.name: Black Strap
black_strap.description:
A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The colour makes it difficult to see the blood-soaked into it.
  • Slightly increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range.

wax_doll.name: Wax Doll
wax_doll.description:
A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgement.
  • Moderately increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range.

spearhead.name: Spearhead
spearhead.description:
The sharp, rusted tip of a spear. It's flaked with blood from its last victim.
  • Moderately increases Rites of Judgement Power duration.

leopard_print_fabric.name: Leopard-Print Fabric
leopard_print_fabric.description:
A shred of pink, leopard-print fabric. It's difficult to tell what it was used for.
  • Slightly increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement.

"It doesn't matter who I am. I'm here for you, James." — Maria

forgotten_videotape.name: Forgotten Videotape
forgotten_videotape.description:
A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.
  • Moderately reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time.

cinderella_music_box.name: Cinderella Music Box
cinderella_music_box.description:
A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella, found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.
  • Moderately increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment.

valtiel_sect_photograph.name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
valtiel_sect_photograph.description:
A photograph of two figures in red hoods. Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.
  • Considerably reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time.

tablet_of_the_oppressor.name: Tablet of the Oppressor
tablet_of_the_oppressor.description:
A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.
  • Considerably increases Rites of Judgement Power duration.

misty_day,_remains_of_judgement.name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgement
misty_day,_remains_of_judgement.description:
A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.
  • Moderately increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement.

"It's him..."

mannequin_foot.name: Mannequin Foot
mannequin_foot.description:
The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.
  • Considerably increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment.

burning_man_painting.name: Burning Man Painting
burning_man_painting.description:
A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.
  • Considerably increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range.

scarlet_egg.name: Scarlet Egg
scarlet_egg.description:
A fresh egg, strikingly red in colour, about the size of a quail's egg.
  • Considerably increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement

"I've never been so scared in my whole life! You couldn't care less about me... could you?" — Maria

rust_coloured_egg.name: Rust-Coloured Egg
rust_coloured_egg.description:
An old-looking egg, coloured reddish orange, about the size of a quail's egg.
  • Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

"James... you made me happy." — Mary

lost_memories_book.name: Lost Memories Book
lost_memories_book.description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.
  • Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 15 seconds.

"They called this place 'The Place of the Silent Spirits'."

crimson_ceremony_book.name: Crimson Ceremony Book
crimson_ceremony_book.description:
A book about an ancient god. Author unknown.
  • Injured Survivors affected by Torment suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect.

"Speak! I am the Crimson One! The lies and the mist are not they, but I!"

obsidian_goblet.name: Obsidian Goblet
obsidian_goblet.description:
An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian.
  • The Executioner gains the Undetectable Status Effect when standing on a Rites of Judgement trail.

"Forgive me for waking you. But without you, I just can't go on." — James Sunderland

iridescent_seal_of_metatron.name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron
iridescent_seal_of_metatron.description:
A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it. The Entity's influence seems to have altered it.
  • When sending a Survivor to a Cage of Atonement, the Auras of all Survivors suffering from Torment are revealed for 6 seconds.

"This magic square, with strong protective and dispelling properties, is called the 'Virun VII Crest' or the 'Seal of Metatron'."

wool_shirt.name: Wool Shirt
wool_shirt.description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".

While Survivors are in the Dream World:

  • Slightly increases Regression penalties of Repair, Healing, and Sabotage actions.

sheep_block.name: Sheep Block
sheep_block.description:
A white and blue wooden block depicting two woolly Lambs grazing and the letter "S".
  • Interacting with a Dream Trap afflicts Survivors with the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

kids_drawing.name: Kid's Drawing
kids_drawing.description:
An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.
  • Gain an extra 200 Bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category when a Survivor triggers a Dream Snare.
  • Considerably decreases Dream Snare slow-down.

garden_rake.name: Garden Rake
garden_rake.description:
A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • 7 Dream Tokens.

prototype_claws.name: Prototype Claws
prototype_claws.description:
A home-made tool to facilitate bush trimming.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • 7 Dream Tokens.
  • Interacting with a Dream Pallet reveals the Survivor's Aura to The Nightmare for 4 seconds.

outdoor_rope.name: Outdoor Rope
outdoor_rope.description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.
  • For Survivors in the Dream World, Outdoor Rope increases the audible range of Survivors' Generator-repairing noises by 8 metres.

nancys_sketch.name: Nancy's Sketch
nancys_sketch.description:
A crude and bold sketch made with Fusain, signed by Nancy H.
  • Slightly decreases Dream Projection cool-down for each sleeping Survivor.

green_dress.name: Green Dress
green_dress.description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.

While Survivors are in the Dream World:

  • Slightly increases Regression penalties of Repair, Healing, and Sabotage actions.
  • When failing such an action's Skill Check , the Survivor's Aura is revealed to The Nightmare for 3 seconds.

cat_block.name: Cat Block
cat_block.description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping Cat and the letter "C".
  • Interacting with a Dream Trap afflicts Survivors with the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 60 seconds.

unicorn_block.name: Unicorn Block
unicorn_block.description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing Unicorn and the letter "U".
  • Interacting with a Dream Trap afflicts Survivors with the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

paint_thinner.name: Paint Thinner
paint_thinner.description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.
  • Replaces Dream Snares with Dream Pallets.
  • 7 Dream Tokens.
  • Interacting with a Dream Pallet reveals the Survivor's Aura to The Nightmare for 6 seconds.

nancys_masterpiece.name: Nancy's Masterpiece
nancys_masterpiece.description:
A painting of a Character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasure memory.
  • Moderately decreases Dream Projection cool-down for each sleeping Survivor.

jump_rope.name: Jump Rope
jump_rope.description:
A long Double Dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.
  • For Survivors in the Dream World, Grunts of Pain are 50 % louder.

blue_dress.name: Blue Dress
blue_dress.description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which's front is ruined by large cuts.

While Survivors are in the Dream World:

  • Slightly increases Regression penalties of Repair, Healing, and Sabotage actions.
  • When failing such an action's Skill Check , the Survivor's Aura is revealed to The Nightmare for 4 seconds.

pill_bottle.name: Pill Bottle
pill_bottle.description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called "Zoneral".
  • Survivors will see The Nightmare intermittently at a reduced distance of 12 to 24 metres.
  • The Nightmare is invisible to Survivors beyond 24 metres.
  • The Nightmare is invisible to awake Survivors while carrying another Survivor.

swing_chains.name: Swing Chains
swing_chains.description:
Rusty, but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.
  • For Survivors in the Dream World, the sounds of their footsteps are 50 % louder.

class_photo.name: Class Photo
class_photo.description:
A large photograph taken at Badham Preschool showing the cheerful class of '94-95.
  • All Generators will now spew blood while The Nightmare channels the Dream Projection ability.
  • The Nightmare's Husk will not appear while using Dream Projection.
  • The Nightmare can no longer cancel the Dream Projection action.

z_block.name: "Z" Block
z_block.description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which's only recognisable feature is the letter "Z".
  • Interacting with a Dream Trap afflicts Survivors with the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 60 seconds.
  • If the Survivor is Healthy , they will nevertheless bleed for the duration of the Haemorrhage Status Effect.

red_paint_brush.name: Red Paint Brush
red_paint_brush.description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.
  • All Survivors start the Trial inside the Dream World.
  • Failing a Skill Check will no longer allow Survivors to wake up.

black_box.name: Black Box
black_box.description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.
  • For Survivors in the Dream World, recently opened Exit Gates are blocked for 15 seconds.

trick_pouch.name: Trick Pouch
trick_pouch.description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets. Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
  • Start with 10 extra Blades.
  • Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 10.

memento_blades.name: Memento Blades
memento_blades.description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse. Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
  • Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Showstopper Score Events.
  • Moderately increases each Survivor's Laceration Meter capacity.

killing_part_chords.name: Killing Part Chords
killing_part_chords.description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for. Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
  • Slightly increases Throw State Movement speed.

inferno_wires.name: Inferno Wires
inferno_wires.description:
Burnt wires form the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members. Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
  • Slightly decreases Main Event Depletion rate.

tequila_moonrock.name: Tequila Moonrock
tequila_moonrock.description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar. Became a favourite of Ji-Woon's.
  • Moderately decreases Main Event Depletion rate.

on_target_single.name: On Target Single
on_target_single.description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame. Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
  • Slightly increases Laceration Meter Decay delay.

lucky_blade.name: Lucky Blade
lucky_blade.description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned. Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
  • Slightly decreases Laceration Meter Decay rate when out of Blades.

ji_woons_autograph.name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
ji_woons_autograph.description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster. Sore as his wrist was after hundred of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
  • Slightly increases initial Throw rate of Blades.

caged_heart_shoes.name: Caged Heart Shoes
caged_heart_shoes.description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart. Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
  • Moderately increases Throw State Movement speed.

melodious_murder.name: Melodious Murder
melodious_murder.description:
An audio file of a victim's crisp, clear shriek as a blade opened her up. Ji-Woon incorporated the sound into one of his more popular tracks.
  • Moderately reduces each Survivor's Laceration Meter capacity.

waiting_for_you_watch.name: Waiting For You Watch
waiting_for_you_watch.description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I'll Be Waiting For You. It's a stage prop that doesn't work and never will.
  • Moderately decreases Laceration Meter Decay rate when out of Blades.

"Don't run away
Don't say we're through
No way to escape this
I'll be waiting for you" — NO SPIN's "Waiting For You"

ripper_brace.name: Ripper Brace
ripper_brace.description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper. Though unintentional, the design stabilises the wrist better than many medical braces.
  • Moderately increases Laceration Meter Decay delay.

fizz_spin_soda.name: Fizz-Spin Soda
fizz_spin_soda.description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN. High sugar and caffeine content.
  • Moderately increases initial Throw rate of Blades.

bloody_boa.name: Bloody Boa
bloody_boa.description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim's slashed neck. A number of pockets are concealed within it.
  • Start with 15 extra Blades.
  • Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 15.

trick_blades.name: Trick Blades
trick_blades.description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination. A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the trick he performed.
  • Allows Blades to ricochet off the environment twice.

edge_of_revival_album.name: Edge of Revival Album
edge_of_revival_album.description:
The Trickster's debut album. The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
  • Blades shatter when hitting the environment, dealing 50 % Laceration to nearby Survivors.

"Your whisper on me
Warm as can be
Burning each breath
Till I can't breathe" — The Trickster's "Whispers of Warmth"

diamond_cufflinks.name: Diamond Cufflinks
diamond_cufflinks.description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon. Rubbing off the blood, there's so much to be seen in the glitter.
  • When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is one Blade Hit away from the maximum, their Aura is revealed for 6 seconds.

"Shhh... you don't have to see your blood anymore." — Ji-Woon Hak

cut_thru_u_single.name: Cut Thru U Single
cut_thru_u_single.description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks. Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.
  • Blades pierce through Survivors.
  • Subsequent Survivors hit by the same Blade receive 50 % Laceration.

"Can't stop this love
That's tearing your heart
Wherever you go
I will cut you apart" — NO SPIN's "Cut Thru U"

iridescent_photocard.name: Iridescent Photocard
iridescent_photocard.description:
A glass-like photo moulded from The Fog itself. Ji Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.
  • When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is one Blade Hit away from the maximum, they are inflicted with the Exposed Status Effect.

"It's okay, scream my name. Let me hear everything the pain awakens..." — Ji-Woon Hak

death_throes_compilation.name: Death Throes Compilation
death_throes_compilation.description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record. Terrifying and emotionally raw.
  • Laceration caused by Blades is based on proximity to the target, starting at a minimum of 50 % Laceration.
  • Each Blade Hit increases the Laceration caused by Blades to a maximum of 200 % Laceration.
  • Once a Blade misses, the Laceration caused by Blades is reset to its initial value.

"Please, no... don't make it hurt... I can't... I..." — Unidentified Voice

philly.name: "Philly"
philly.description:
A stolen camera from a victim of Olsen in Philadelphia, where he worked before. The film inside captured his last night in the city.
  • Slightly reduces the Stalk time when not leaning from cover.

"Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I don't wanna forget any of it". — The Ghost Face

walleyes_matchbook.name: Walleyes Matchbook
walleyes_matchbook.description:
A sheet of matches from Walleyes, a small bar in Northern Roseville. A victim's phone number is scribbled in blue. One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
  • Slightly reduces Night Shroud Recovery time.

headlines_cut_outs.name: Headlines Cut-outs
headlines_cut_outs.description:
Cut-outs of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania. While Ghost Face just authored some of the headlines, he committed all of the murders. Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
  • Slightly increases Movement speed while Stalking.

cheap_cologne.name: Cheap Cologne
cheap_cologne.description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol. Worn by The Ghost Face to make his presence known. Reserved for impromptu visits.
  • Slightly increases Marked duration on Survivors.

telephoto_lens.name: Telephoto Lens
telephoto_lens.description:
A manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
  • Slightly reduces the Stalk time when not leaning from cover.
  • Slightly increases Marked duration on Survivors.

reusable_cinch_straps.name: Reusable Cinch Straps
reusable_cinch_straps.description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
  • Slightly increases Movement speed when crouched.

olsens_journal.name: Olsen's Journal
olsens_journal.description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries. The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims. Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
  • Moderately increases Movement speed while Stalking.

olsens_address_book.name: Olsen's Address Book
olsens_address_book.description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing. All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
  • Moderately reduces Night Shroud Recovery time.

marked_map.name: Marked Map
marked_map.description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida. Each 'X' represents a victim of The Ghost Face. Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
  • Slightly increases Killer Instinct duration when The Ghost Face is revealed.

olsens_wallet.name: Olsen's Wallet
olsens_wallet.description:
Olsen's wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen's first Roseville victim. Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
  • Considerably increases Movement speed while Stalking.

leather_knife_sheath.name: Leather Knife Sheath
leather_knife_sheath.description:
A quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade. Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
  • Moderately increases Movement speed when crouched.

lasting_perfume.name: Lasting Perfume
lasting_perfume.description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by Ghost Face to announce his presence. Reserved for the victims he planned to write about.
  • Moderately increases Marked duration on Survivors.

knife_belt_clip.name: Knife Belt Clip
knife_belt_clip.description:
A perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly. No one knows what you are planning to do tonight.
  • Moderately reduces the Stalk time when not leaning from cover.

chewed_pen.name: Chewed Pen
chewed_pen.description:
A blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny's DNA. Incriminating evidence that was never found.
  • Considerably reduces Night Shroud Recovery time.

victims_detailed_routine.name: Victim's Detailed Routine
victims_detailed_routine.description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville. Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
  • Moderately increases Killer Instinct duration when The Ghost Face is revealed.
  • Moderately decreases the Detection range to reveal The Ghost Face while Night Shroud is active.

"I've been watching you for a while. I wanted this to be special; the kind of headlines that people don't forget". — The Ghost Face

night_vision_monocular.name: Night Vision Monocular
night_vision_monocular.description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness. Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
  • Considerably reduces the Stalk time when not leaning from cover.

drop_leg_knife_sheath.name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
drop_leg_knife_sheath.description:
A sheath allowing for a full motion range: ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely. Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
  • Considerably increases Movement speed when crouched.

"Gotta get ready like a scout — without the stupid patches. What I get is much better." — The Ghost Face

drivers_license.name: Driver's License
drivers_license.description:
A driver's license revealing Olsen's true identity: Danny Johnson.
  • Considerably decreases the Detection range to reveal The Ghost Face while Night Shroud is active.

"They all want to know who Ghost Face is. But what they should ask is, who's next." — The Ghost Face

ghost_face_caught_on_tape.name: "Ghost Face Caught on Tape"
ghost_face_caught_on_tape.description:
A tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorised Roseville.
  • Tremendously reduces the Stalk time when leaning from cover.
  • Tremendously increases the Stalk time when not leaning from cover.

"In this footage, a dark figure is seen entering a house late at night in Northern Roseville, Florida. The police were called the next morning to report a murder in the area. Lock your doors: a Killer is in our midst, roaming freely, like a ghost in the night." — The Roseville Gazette

outdoor_security_camera.name: Outdoor Security Camera
outdoor_security_camera.description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville. The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of Ghost Face without providing any real clue to the police.
  • The Auras of all Survivors outside of The Ghost Face's Terror Radius are revealed for 4 seconds when a Marked Survivor is put into the Dying State .

"An image is worth a thousand words". — The Ghost Face

vhs_porn.name: VHS Porn
vhs_porn.description:
An all time classic.
You won't see things quite the same again.
  • Colours Tonic Gas Clouds yellow.
  • Colours Antidote Gas Clouds purple.

robin_feather.name: Robin Feather
robin_feather.description:
A warm orange feather, soft to the touch.
  • Slightly decreases cool-down time between Bottle throws.

party_bottle.name: Party Bottle
party_bottle.description:
Be the life of the party!

Party Bottles emit confetti when they break, in addition to their usual Gas effect.

  • Hitting a Survivor directly with a Party Bottle interrupts actions as usual, and awards 100 Bonus Bloodpoints.

fingerless_parade_gloves.name: Fingerless Parade Gloves
fingerless_parade_gloves.description:
Part of the standard Clown apparel, the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations.
  • Changes the Bottle's Throw arc.

thick_cork_stopper.name: Thick Cork Stopper
thick_cork_stopper.description:
A sturdy cork fitting The Afterpiece Tonic bottles marvellously.
  • Moderately decreases Reload time.

sticky_soda_bottle.name: Sticky Soda Bottle
sticky_soda_bottle.description:
An empty bottle, sticky with dried sugar and blood.
  • Start with 1 extra Bottle.
  • Increases Bottle Carrying capacity by 1.

starling_feather.name: Starling Feather
starling_feather.description:
A black feather with an emerald gloss, very soft to the touch.
  • Moderately decreases cool-down time between Bottle throws.

solvent_jug.name: Solvent Jug
solvent_jug.description:
A chemical volatile compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of the Afterpiece Antidote.
  • Moderately increases Invigorated duration.

kerosene_can.name: Kerosene Can
kerosene_can.description:
A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled.
  • Intoxicated Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

sulphuric_acid_vial.name: Sulphuric Acid Vial
sulphuric_acid_vial.description:
An odour-less syrupy liquid with high corrosiveness.
  • Intoxicated Survivors suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

spirit_of_hartshorn.name: Spirit of Hartshorn
spirit_of_hartshorn.description:
A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia. One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds.
  • Moderately expands the Afterpiece Antidote Gas Area of Effect.
  • Moderately increases the Afterpiece Antidote Gas Spread velocity.

smelly_inner_soles.name: Smelly Inner Soles
smelly_inner_soles.description:
A mouldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet.
  • Moderately increases Reloading Movement speed.

flask_of_bleach.name: Flask of Bleach
flask_of_bleach.description:
A potent chemical which causes irritation, burns and lung damage.
  • Intoxicated Survivors suffer from an extra 5 % penalty to the Hindered Status Effect.

bottle_of_chloroform.name: Bottle of Chloroform
bottle_of_chloroform.description:
A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anaesthetic capabilities.
  • Moderately expands the Afterpiece Tonic Gas Area of Effect.
  • Moderately increases the Afterpiece Tonic Gas Spread velocity.

garish_make_up_kit.name: Garish Make-up Kit
garish_make_up_kit.description:
Some for the face and some for the Antidote. The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effect.
  • Considerably increases Invigorated duration.

ether_15_vol%.name: Ether 15 Vol%
ether_15_vol%.description:
A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration.
  • Considerably increases Intoxicated duration.

cigar_box.name: Cigar Box
cigar_box.description:
A grim and incomplete collection of fingers. Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities.
  • When a Player becomes Invigorated, they see the Auras of all other Players within a radius of 16 metres.

cheap_gin_bottle.name: Cheap Gin Bottle
cheap_gin_bottle.description:
The only remnant of a cheap good time and one hell of a headache.
  • Start with 2 extra Bottles.
  • Increases Bottle Carrying capacity by 2.

tattoos_middle_finger.name: Tattoo's Middle Finger
tattoos_middle_finger.description:
The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man. Has a faint taste of machinery oil.
  • Both Intoxicated and Invigorated Survivors reveal their Aura to The Clown for 6 seconds.

redheads_pinky_finger.name: Redhead's Pinky Finger
redheads_pinky_finger.description:
The prized pinky finger of a redhead. Faintly fragrant. Tastes of potpourri and varnish.
  • While Intoxicated, Survivors that were hit directly with a Bottle of Afterpiece Tonic suffer from the Exposed Status Effect.

toy_sword.name: Toy Sword
toy_sword.description:
A minuscule toy sword, only a few inches long. Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
  • Slightly decreases Pounce Charge requirement.

tiny_fingernail.name: Tiny Fingernail
tiny_fingernail.description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor’s death. As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
  • Moderately reduces Victor's Unbinding time.

soured_milk.name: Soured Milk
soured_milk.description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured. Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
  • Slightly increases Victor's Shriek radius.

cat_figurine.name: Cat Figurine
cat_figurine.description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye. He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
  • Displays the target location of a Pounce.

madeleines_glove.name: Madeleine's Glove
madeleines_glove.description:
A glove once owned by The Twins' mother. During desperate times, it was held over Victor's mouth to keep him from making a peep.
  • Moderately increases Victor's Shriek radius.

ceremonial_candelabrum.name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
ceremonial_candelabrum.description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn. A symbol of his tenacity.
  • Slightly increases time needed for Survivors to crush Victor.

cats_eye.name: Cat's Eye
cats_eye.description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes family. Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
  • Victor's Shrieks stop when Pounce is fully charged.

bloody_black_hood.name: Bloody Black Hood
bloody_black_hood.description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte. Soon, he became the prey.
  • Slightly reduces Cool-down time when switching to Charlotte.

baby_teeth.name: Baby Teeth
baby_teeth.description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago. They're unusually sharp.
  • Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 15 seconds.

weighty_rattle.name: Weighty Rattle
weighty_rattle.description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him. It's entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
  • Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 20 seconds.

stale_biscuit.name: Stale Biscuit
stale_biscuit.description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town’s market. It wasn't much, but it was better than most meals
  • Slightly decreases Victor's Pounce cool-down.

sewer_sludge.name: Sewer Sludge
sewer_sludge.description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
  • Slightly increases time needed for Survivors to remove Victor.

rusted_needle.name: Rusted Needle
rusted_needle.description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children's tattered clothes.
  • Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until healed.

madeleines_scarf.name: Madeleine's Scarf
madeleines_scarf.description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death. The Twins kept it as a memento.
  • Slightly increases Victor's Movement speed.

"...shall hereby be recorded as a service to the greater good and the extermination of evil." — Inquiry into the death of Madeleine Deshayes

victors_soldier.name: Victor's Soldier
victors_soldier.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared. Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
  • If a Survivor crushes Victor while he's idle, their Aura is revealed for to Charlotte for 6 seconds.

"Kch--kch—k'ull bawd mennn..." — Victor Deshayes

spinning_top.name: Spinning Top
spinning_top.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own. He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
  • Survivors drop any carried Item when pounced on by Victor.

"Hush... hush... it is yours then." — Charlotte Deshayes

forest_stew.name: Forest Stew
forest_stew.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
  • Moderately increases Victor's Movement speed.

"Eat... eat, child. You'll feel better when it's down." — Madeleine Deshayes

drop_of_perfume.name: Drop of Perfume
drop_of_perfume.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with. It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
  • Survivors within Victor's Shriek radius suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

"Beware the deceit of witches, for they exploit the goodness in men's hearts." — A History of Witches and Demons (1602)

silencing_cloth.name: Silencing Cloth
silencing_cloth.description:
A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth. Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
  • After waking from her Dormant State, Charlotte is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.

"I don't like this game anymore, Mother..." — Charlotte Deshayes

iridescent_pendant.name: Iridescent Pendant
iridescent_pendant.description:
A glass-like pendant moulded from The Fog itself. There's a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
  • If a Survivor crushes Victor while he's idle, they suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 30 seconds.

"Your binding is no curse, my loves. It is your strength to draw upon." — Madeleine Deshayes

rope_necklet.name: Rope Necklet
rope_necklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
  • Slightly reduces Phantasm Trap Setting time.

powdered_eggshell.name: Powdered Eggshell
powdered_eggshell.description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
  • Slightly increases tripped Phantasm Trap duration.

dead_fly_mud.name: Dead Fly Mud
dead_fly_mud.description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies. Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Slightly increases Phantasm Trap Teleportation distance.

bog_water.name: Bog Water
bog_water.description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
  • Slightly increases Phantasm Trap range.

pussy_willow_catkins.name: Pussy Willow Catkins
pussy_willow_catkins.description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
  • Reveals the Survivor's Aura for 3 seconds when they trip the Phantasm Trap.

half_eggshell.name: Half Eggshell
half_eggshell.description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
  • Slightly increases tripped Phantasm Trap duration.

dragonfly_wings.name: Dragonfly Wings
dragonfly_wings.description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp. Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Moderately increases Phantasm Trap Teleportation distance.

cypress_necklet.name: Cypress Necklet
cypress_necklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
  • Moderately reduces Phantasm Traps Setting time.

bloodied_water.name: Bloodied Water
bloodied_water.description:
Tainted water contained in a folded water lily leaf.
  • Moderately increases Phantasm Trap range.

willow_wreath.name: Willow Wreath
willow_wreath.description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
  • Reveals the Survivor's Aura for 5 seconds when they trip the Phantasm Trap.

swamp_orchid_necklet.name: Swamp Orchid Necklet
swamp_orchid_necklet.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
  • Considerably reduces Phantasm Trap Setting time.

dried_cicada.name: Dried Cicada
dried_cicada.description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash. Crispy. Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Considerably increases Phantasm Trap Teleportation distance.

cracked_turtle_egg.name: Cracked Turtle Egg
cracked_turtle_egg.description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
  • Considerably increases tripped Phantasm Trap duration.

bloodied_mud.name: Bloodied Mud
bloodied_mud.description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson. The bloody layers empower the mud.
  • Considerably increases Phantasm Trap range.

scarred_hand.name: Scarred Hand
scarred_hand.description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Mud Phantasms have collision.
  • Removes The Hag's ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.
  • Grants 300 % Bonus Bloodpoints from Deviousness Score Events.

Scarred Hand trumps all other Add-ons.

"..." — The Butcher

rusty_shackles.name: Rusty Shackles
rusty_shackles.description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Tripped Phantasm Traps do not spawn a Mud Phantasm.
  • Tripped Phantasm Traps give no indication of being triggered to the Survivor.

grandmas_heart.name: Grandma's Heart
grandmas_heart.description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Decreases The Hag's Terror Radius to 0 metres when a Survivor triggers a Phantasm Trap.
  • Increases a Mud Phantasm's Terror Radius to 16 metres for the tripped Phantasm Trap duration.

"Bring me another slice of the girl." — Grandma

disfigured_ear.name: Disfigured Ear
disfigured_ear.description:
The cannibal village deaf boy's ear. Deformed due to several hits to the head. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Survivors who trigger a Phantasm Trap are deafened for 6 seconds.

waterlogged_shoe.name: Waterlogged Shoe
waterlogged_shoe.description:
A child's shoe, long lost in the bog's waters. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Survivors within the Phantasm Trap range suffer from the Hindered Status Effect.
  • Slightly increases The Hag's Base Movement speed.
  • Removes The Hag's ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.

Waterlogged Shoe trumps all other Add-ons.

mint_rag.name: Mint Rag
mint_rag.description:
A small piece of cotton torn from the dress worn by Lisa Sherwood on the day she disappeared. The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • The Hag can teleport to any Phantasm Trap on the Map at will, with a cool-down of 15 seconds in-between Teleports.
  • Tripped Phantasm Trap Teleportation remains unchanged.
